Text: Now that I've associated my uTorrent ver. 1.8.2 with magnet links under the Options-General Preferences menus, I don't get the error messages anymore, and can download. I hope that this helps others with recent magnet links problems. BTW, I prefer ver. 1.8.2 because of the easier user interface, with headings clearly shown. Thanks for this great Shirley Bassey upload!
